DataElement.preferredName: Medical Oncology First Other Treatment Preference Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the kind of first other treatment preference with medical oncology.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Oncology First Other Therapeutic Procedure Preference
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The study and treatment of cancers with chemicals, biological products or immunotherapy._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The study and treatment of cancers with chemicals, biological products or immunotherapy.

Concepts.definition: The study and treatment of cancers with chemicals, biological products or immunotherapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Dr. Turkbey P173316 request 11.21.17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added OBIB alternate name and identifier DW 03-21-2019
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2023.1.20 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001943. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
